data.text: @Jim_Oberst The handling of covid has been illogical from the start. That's why you have so much mistrust. Closing schools when children have minimal risks. Making covid a partisan issue. Shaming people with opinions that don't match mainstream. Cherry picking data to support a narrative...

I know they hate history

Masks in medicine (1300s) 800 years of science,

224 on vaccines (invented in 1796, by Edward Jenner).

95% of the dead not vaccinated.  N95 = 83% less spread.  

Learn the lessons of history https://t.co/q0ZEVC9bgA
